campaign.story:
The first version of CARD Light was designed in 2012. The source of inspiration was my father, who was always writing calligraphy in a dimly lit corner to avoid disturbance to others.
My job nature requires frequent travelling. There is a need to draw and take product photoshoots on the go. With the advancement of battery technology, I aspired to improve the light and coupled it with more functions.
DESIGN
We have upgraded the CARD Light with functional enhancements and design improvements. The specific features are as follows:
1. Small & Bright
With the dimensions of  86 x 55.8 x 24.5 mm, it's the size of a credit card. The maximum brightness is 2300 lux (@ 23cm.) With 2 brightness for 3 colors, there is a total of 6 modes. 45 degree convergent light caters to personal use without bothering others.
2.Max & Fast
Built-in 5200mAh lithium polymer battery supports the light to run continuously over 10 hours*. Battery can be fully charged in 2 hours with TYPE-C port, and supports dual USB output port (share 15W PD.)
3.Easy & Versatile
Built-in Hall sensor switches the light on automatically when unfolding CARD Light. With a single button, you can easily switch the light modes. Flexible structure design allows you to adjust the angles for any purpose. Multifunctional clip is assembled with neodymium magnet and flippable nano-suction Pad. Sturdy base of CARD Light can be fixed anywhere you want.
Switch Operation
 Glue Dots Pad
The Glue Dots Pad is waterproof, it can be used indoor and outdoor. Consists of a durable acrylic adhesive with viscoelastic properties, make the adhesive tape suitable for most surfaces. Simple peel, and No wall damage. 
Wash it with water and dry it to regain its stickiness when the Washable Adhesive Tape gets dirty. The removable double-sided tape is very easy to remove and will not damage your walls or surfaces.
Using the Glue Dots Pad 
Feature 
With that, this is the retrofits of CARD Light that we strive to improve. I have carried DVT sample with me for over a year, and it has become an essential part of my life. If you travel alone and study over night just like me, I would like to share, the best partner, CARD Light with you.
 What Is KableCARD ?
In 2018, we successfully launched KableCARD with your support and love. It is as small, light, and multifunctional as a Swiss army knife. People love it! Therefore, we kept the original functions, and upgraded them. Now, KableCARD is not just the same but better.
What Is New
1. 7.5W Wireless Charging
We upgraded the wireless charger output from 5W to 7.5W. With a faster charging speed, more time is saved.
2. Magnetic Locator
New design of magnetic locator for iphone 12 accurately aligns the phone on the charging spot. It supports all iphone 12 series(mini/Pro/Max.)
3. Silicone Cable + Enhanced Adapter
We replaced the cable material with environmentally friendly silicone. It is more flexible and durable than previous version. Being resistant to deformation, you can flex the cable freely to adjust it for different purposes. The adapters are made from upgraded parts (Soldered PCB >>Insert PCB) to enhance the durability.
4. More Color Options
In addition to black and white, we are also introducing new colors, Ruby and Sapphire. The translucent design conveys functionality clearly. Various options to meet your need! 
5. Green Package
Continuing our practice of green packaging through multifuncional usage, we designed the packaging into a A8 size organizer. Besides storing the KableCARD, it can also be used as a memo book.
We appreciate your support for KableCARD. We hope these improvements will bring more convenience and efficiency to your life, and get through this tough year with you.
REWARDS

campaign.story:
ShadowCast is the simplest way to play console games on your computer. TVs aren’t always convenient so we made a way to take console gaming with you wherever you are without the need of an internet connection.       



As lifelong console gamers, we know there may be some PC master race gamers who gawk at the idea of playing Mario on their powerful gaming computer.  But we say the more games we can play, on even more platforms, the better! 
Seamless console docking to your laptop. It's that simple!
Laptops are Really Versatile Screens
The biggest benefit of course is to take advantage of the screen you’re always carrying already.  Not one of those additional portable monitors but a laptop that we use daily for like… school, work, shopping and creative stuff. 
ShadowCast completely hides in the shadows of the original Switch dock!
Let's imagine a time before 2020... and you were waiting at an airport for a flight to board and you wanted to get a couple rounds of Smash Bros in with a friend… or two… or three. Tabletop mode is nice… but let’s just say it’s not the most ergonomic. With ShadowCast you can easily plug your Nintendo Switch to your laptop and play on a screen over 4x the size.
Not quite as easy as adjusting the viewing angle of a laptop, is it?
You Could Always use Another TV
There's also many situations where there just isn’t a HDMI display available - many of us are happy with our laptops and integrated desktop computers. I think back to the times when I lived in a dorm room or even living abroad for brief periods where having my laptop, a PS5, and a ShadowCast would’ve been amazing. 
Works with current-gen and next-gen with up to 4K input
And then there’s always competing for the living room television - whether it’s someone in your household streaming a whole season of the latest Netflix series or just having another gamer in the household. Oh and it also makes having a second television for multiplayer that much more convenient to set up. 
PS5 on an iMac - when a TV just simply isn't available
Our App Makes the Difference
Accompanying the ShadowCast is our new Genki Arcade app. We literally have made it easier than reaching for the TV remote and hitting the "input" button. We've designed Genki Arcade from the ground up to minimize computing resources and prioritize latency for gaming performance. Just open the app, and it'll auto detect ShadowCast and you'll be playing immediately without any settings to fiddle with.
TV vs. ShadowCast - HDMI splitter shows a 0-0.02s difference in Smash Bros.
Genki Arcade (left) is 50ms faster than OBS (right) and uses less than 1/3 of the CPU
We've developed a native Mac OS app that's optimized for both Apple Silicon and Intel processors as well as a dedicated app for Windows. Additionally, we're in the process of making a web browser version that allows you to play on shared/public computers and other systems without installing any software (compatibility will vary, for example iPadOS currently doesn’t detect external video devices but we’re confident it will someday!).
Windows or Mac, we got your Animal Crossing addiction covered
 The beauty of being able to connect your gaming console to your computer means you can actually record, edit, and stream your gameplay. While it may not be at the same level as a professional grade capture card that costs 5-10x more, it’s more than capable for most gameplay capturing needs while being much more flexible and easy to use across multiple platforms. 
We're making last year's best capture cards feel a bit outdated.
Record To Your Heart’s Content
Sure you can use the built-in video recording feature on the Nintendo Switch but that’s limited to 30 seconds - that mean you'll have to rush that epic boss fight or finish that speed-run extra fast.  It's is also a pain to export and you’re limited by an already small internal storage and expensive memory cards. With ShadowCast you don't have to worry about recording length and can rewatch your whole session of Among Us, add your commentary, and refine your strategy.
With a 30 second limit everyone is sus!
We’ve actually created what we believe is the most simple to use, not just for playing but also to record gameplay videos.  Here’s a sample of a recording of us playing on various consoles with the ShadowCast: 
These videos are screen recordings of gameplay played off an early build of our dedicated Genki Arcade app.
Plays Nice with Others 
We made the Genki Arcade app to be truly simple to use, but for those that need more complexity you’ll be happy to know that ShadowCast is compatible with popular professional capture card applications such as Open Broadcaster Software (OBS), Streamlabs OBS, XSplit, and much more. This will allow you to capture video with detailed customizations and even overlay various webcam feeds, graphics, and animations.
It's pretty much compatible with everything you throw at it

Begin Your Career as an Influencer
Ultimately the main reason for anyone to capture video is so that they can share it with the world. ShadowCast can easily upload your previously recorded or edited videos and even stream live to your favorite platform - whether your team Twitch, YouTube, or FaceBook, we got you covered.  
To maximize compatibility across as many platforms as possible, we’ve disguised ShadowCast as a webcam so that it can do a few more party tricks. This means it can actually be selected as a webcam under many typical apps popular today thanks to all the remote working, including Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and FaceTime - and further even supports video players like QuickTime and VLC if you don’t have our app installed.
Video Chat Your Gameplay
This allows you to not only share your gameplay live with anyone, but you can actually play with your friends and see them on split screen just as if you were playing in couch co-op mode in-person.
You can play any of your favorite games in split-screen even without being on a couch
Don’t Settle for a Weak Webcam
As an additional benefit, ShadowCast works with all HDMI output devices beyond gaming consoles, including better cameras.  This means you can upgrade your video conference by swapping out your poor built-in webcam for most digital cameras, including DSLRs, camcorders, and action cameras - as long as it supports HDMI out (some cameras require a HDMI-mini/micro converter).  No more grainy, low resolution videos with poor lighting. 
Kickstarter compresses these images, but hopefully you get the idea!
The Perfect Stay-at-Home Camera Assistant
It’s also quite useful for situations where you just need to see what you're photographing or recording on a bigger laptop screen - no need for expensive wireless monitors! 
A better view of your DSLR in real-time so you can skip the expensive screen monitor
We actually had the idea of ShadowCast back in 2019 and started to collaborate with  manufacturers of the top video streaming and capture card brands. The timing was a bit too early as the components needed were overly expensive and had originally intended to make a Super Dock. Since then, we've refined the idea, dived into software and made something that we're quite excited to share here.
Might as well make it as small as possible right?

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We launched the most funded gaming hardware project on Kickstarter of 2018 and 2019 so we've been through this rodeo. By now the risks are less of us being able to make the product but more likely if we deliver on time. One of the biggest chunks of time is always the pre-production phase which includes tooling/mold production, test molds, and securing components. This time, we’ve actually gotten a lot of the work done before launching the project which means greater financial risk for us but a lot less timeline uncertainty for our backers. We're happy to say we're even better equipped to face these challenges but no matter how much we plan there’s always a chance that things can go wrong. Whether its production, logistics, or completely random events, we promise to always share with you full transparency on our hiccups and resolve them in a way that keeps our backers happy and proud to keep supporting Genki.

Note: there are some shipping risks now to certain countries dealing with uncertainty such as the UK (Brexit) and new India import tariffs. Regional lockdowns also impact postal services but we'll do our best to get ShadowCast to you wherever you are.

So the good news is we are done with production of the Early Access batch and will be distributing to global warehouses so that we can get packages to you in a quick and reliable manner. Wow, just wow. Our biggest project, ever.
We can't believe how crazy this project has been from beginning to end and what a finish.  You guys are awesome, 30,382 of you (and 7,243 of you are first time Kickstarter backers, welcome!) have supported this project and we can't be more thrilled to be able to bring this project to life.

Merry Chrismahanukwanzakah!

We hit our funding goal in a mere 22 minutes(!) and to be honest we never expected to creep past our Covert Dock launch - especially given that we launched on a holiday week!  So just to say it again and again, thank you!

campaign.story:
Darwin’s Journey is a worker placement euro game where players recall Charles Darwin’s memories of his adventure through the Galapagos islands, which contributed to the development of his theory of evolution.
With an innovative worker progression system, each worker will have to study the disciplines that are a prerequisite to perform several actions in the game, such as exploration, correspondence, and discovering specimens in order to contribute to the human knowledge of biology.
The game lasts 5 rounds, and with several short and long-term objectives, every action you take will grant victory points in different ways. The tension and strategic planning that increases over the duration of the match and the fascinating vibe that the game conveys make Darwin’s Journey one of the most ambitious projects that Thundergryph has crafted in its story as a board game publisher.
Join the Thundergryph family! Interact with us to earn Thunders and redeem them for rewards while planting trees. We are excited about this opportunity to engage more with you and we are looking forward to revealing everything we have planned for the future!
If you are part of the club, use this special code "DODO" to get 500 Thunders!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
SCHEDULING IS IMPORTANT.

Shaping the games together with our backers is one of the most interesting things of being a Kickstarter creator, but all of this additional content needs to be meticulously calculated before the campaign starts to add enough buffer time to the communicated timeline, while still being unaware of how successful a project will be.

Revising the timeline affects the delivery and affects the company's stability by postponing future releases. We commit to do our best to fulfill as previously calculated.

Unforeseen problems like the current Pandemic can happen and we commit to being transparent and thorough with our progress.

CREATING A GAME TOGETHER.

When you back one of our campaigns, you are not pre-ordering a product, you are really helping us make the game happen. This is a feeling we don’t want to lose, but we also understand that a game needs to be fulfilled at the right time.

For Darwin's Journey, we segmented the potential success of the project into four different outcomes and we have decided to establish the proper buffer based on the best-case scenario. This gives us room to listen to our community without compromising what we love the most about launching on Kickstarter: shaping a game together.

WE LEARN. WE HEAR YOU.

Starting in 2019, we decided to split our team into groups. We would be working at the same time on different projects and we would request help from freelancers if needed, without compromising our main tasks as a team.

The Matchbox collection is undergoing freight and will be delivered in February.
Spirits of the Forest: Moonlight is undergoing the initial stage of production and we are on time for our estimate of May 2021.

Today, after 8 campaigns under our belt, we are much more solid as a team, having greater confidence in facing the challenges that the future holds, and we owe all of this to you and your support towards our projects.

We will always be grateful and we will always be prepared to listen and learn from your advice.

Thank you for trusting us in this endeavor and we are sure you will be proud of the game we have created together with your unconditional love and support.

campaign.story:
Welcome to the SECOND Button Shy reprint campaign! We have recently published our 70th(!?) Wallet Game and wanted to revisit some favorites that have run low or out of stock. 
This campaign will work a little differently than our usual campaigns. Here we will start with 3 fan favorites and as stretch goals are hit, we will add more games to the print run. With each stretch goal, we will invite you to help vote for the next game that we add. With each new game, we will add a new reward level allowing backers to get all of the games at these Kickstarter discounted prices.

THE FOLLOWING GAMES ARE AVAILABLE AS OF NOW:
Ahead In The Clouds by Daniel Newman
Anthelion: Conclave of Power by Daniel Solis
Antinomy by John Baluci
Arcane Bakery Clash by Robin Gibson
Handsome by TC Petty III
Hierarchy by Hugo Kawamata
Liberation by Jon Simantov
Ragemore by Bojan Prakljacic
Seasons of Rice by Corry Damey
Smoke & Mirrors by Chip Beauvais
Supertall by Nat Levan
Why I Otter by Aaron Andrew Wilson
Each of the games below has some video content, but this amazing video covers both Antinomy (24:05) and Liberation (26:40), so instead of repeating it we'll just show it here. Although, with the number of views on it, I can only imagine you've already seen it. :)

Let's jump into the available games!


/an-tin-uh-mee/ noun
(A contradiction between two beliefs or conclusions that are in themselves reasonable; a paradox)
As a Sorcerer, you have long sought ancient relics, imbued with  magic. What unspeakable power can you unleash when you collect relics  from anywhere in the spacetime continuum?
Antinomy is a head to head battle of wits as 2 competing sorcerers in search of powerful Paradox Crystals. Play a single card from your hand using the color or symbol to dive into the  past, or use the number to fly into the future. The card you land on gets swapped with the card you played allowing you to build up a winning hand. Wherever you go, clever card play and a set of 3-of-a-kind cause paradoxes forming crystals of your own. Or confront your opponent in a clash to wrest control of their crystals. Collecting 5 of these crystals will ensure your control over space and time. Do you have what it takes to wield the power of Antinomy?
EXPANSION AVAILABLE: Solo Flare (solo play) - Add it during checkout for just $2 (normally $4).


It's been a long time coming. You and a particular co-worker at  the Arcane Bakery simply cannot work together anymore. In a moment of frustration, you challenge them to a duel: After close, no holds barred. The loser resigns... and cleans up the mess.
Arcane Bakery Clash is a resource management game, where your resource is time. Specifically, time to cook the magical treats that you will use against your co-worker. You can choose 2 actions per turn, and you will either put a recipe card in the oven, peek into an oven (in case you forgot what you started cooking), turn up the heat (and advance the track on the back of a recipe card), or take a recipe out of the oven (putting the card into play). With these actions you will bake new treats that are used to either reduce your opponent’s health, heal yourself, or allow special actions. When a  player’s health is reduced to zero, they lose the game, and their opponent wins!
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: Mystery Ingredients (more cards) and Boss Bake-Off 1, 2 and 3 (solo play) - Add them during checkout for just $1 each (normally $3)


For  hundreds of generations, the tyrannical Intercosmic Dynasty has ruled  the galaxy with a titanium fist. Their power and reach is spreading, but  so is word of their misdeeds. A band of resistance fighters known as  the Liberation has begun striking at the Dynasty from a hidden base.  Will you help the Liberation gain enough support before their secret  base is discovered, or will the you wield the awesome power of the  Dynasty to hunt down these traitors and bring them to heel?
Using a tiny deck of only 18 cards, Liberation plays out a miniature rebellion of galactic scale on your tabletop. An  asymmetrical game of cat and mouse, the Dynasty player expands their web  of power, occupying and exploiting planet cards, while the Liberation  player strikes from the shadows, sabotaging the Dynasty’s hand and  performing daring missions. The odds are long and the stakes are high.  Can you stall long enough to cycle through the deck 3 times, earning  enough support to topple the Dynasty, or will you scour the galactic  map, tightening the noose around the secret base of the Liberation to  attack and destroy them? The future of the galaxy is at stake!
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: Warped World and Moon of Mystery (more locations and new abilities) - Add them during checkout for just $2 and $1 (normally $4 and $3)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
$20,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Ahead In The Clouds
The  citizens of the Empacta skies long for  the days where everyone, not  just the wealthy, can ditch their masks  and breathe the precious air  that they call their home.
As an industrialist, you will collect dust  particles from the air  and water vapor from the clouds to convert to  hydrogen and oxygen.
By collecting, converting and selling these  precious resources,  you can provide your family with the breathing  room that you need to  keep your business afloat and go home at night  knowing you made a  difference to the world with fresh air.
In Ahead in the Clouds,  each player can  take three actions each turn. Options are either  taking/converting  resources via connected buildings or Cloudbursting,  which is breaking up  the established network of buildings. Players can  also take free  actions during their turn to claim contracts to gain  victory points, or  connect their habitat to other buildings. Players  must also be ready for  the blimp from below, which comes every couple  of rounds to take  resources back down to the land dwellers.
After 8 rounds, the player with the most contracts wins.
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: Tents Trackers and Contracts (more variety) - Add it during checkout for just $1 (normally $3).
$25,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Supertall
In the heart of the city, steel beams race skyward. While other cities sprawl endlessly outwards, these city  planners are looking up -  up - UP! Real estate prices are skyrocketing, and it’s time for a new class of skyscraper, the “Supertall”, to reshape the skyline.
In Supertall,  2-3 players are competing  developers, presenting their plans for new  skyscrapers. Featuring 18  Plan cards with various amenities, players  draw 1 card each turn and  must choose to add it to their skyscrapers,  pass it to their rivals, or  leverage it for special abilities. Once all  the plans have been built, players score points based on the mix of  Residential, Business,  Entertainment, and Green Space amenities in  their skyscrapers. However,  due to constant lobbying, City Hall will  heavily tax one of those types  making it worth 0 points, so be sure to  plan ahead. The player with the  most points using hard work and good  planning will rise to the top, in Supertall!
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: Municipal Buildings (variety and 4th player) and Spires if Supertall (new scoring) - Add them during checkout for just $2 each (normally $4 each).
$30,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Seasons of Rice
In Seasons of Rice, Corry Damey’s 18-card   tribute to his Cambodian  heritage, players are  farmers puzzling  together paddy cards to expand  their family’s  “landscape” of rice  paddies and ensure the most  bountiful of harvests.
Players will be drafting cards and placing them into their expanding   landscape area to close off paddies in order to score the most points  by  the end of the game.
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: Jasmine & Ginger and The Water Festival (adds new setup and goals). Add them during checkout for just $2 (normally $4 ).
$35,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Smoke & Mirrors
Smoke & Mirrors is a bluffing game for  2-5 players. As the  greatest magicians in the world, players  will  compete for the top spot by trying to go bigger and better than the  previous magician using a limited number of tricks. But the players need  to watch how much they share, because once their secrets are revealed, they are out!
Players each get 3 trick cards, from 3 different decks. They must use these cards to create a magic act that has a trick value of one  number higher than the player to their left using any amount of their cards. If successful, the players continue, building more and more dangerous magic acts. The winner is the last player standing.
EXPANSION AVAILABLE: Smoke and Mirrors: Deduction (adds a 4th suit and new elements). Add it during checkout for just $2 (normally $4).
$40,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Why I Otter
The river is filled with otters of all  shapes and sizes. Decide which otter should jump into the river at the  right time to maximize  your score. Having the winning otter gets you  more cards, but losing lets you pick the scoring conditions.
Why I otter.....
 $45,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Hierarchy
In the Kingdom of Darkhill, order and  power mean everything. The royalty reign supreme, but alongside of  their control are the plotting  citizens, planning to get ahead using  any means possible.
Hierarchy is an abstract game of order and power where players each  take a random set of 7 cards and play them openly, until they cannot  play any more. Cards must be played atop a card of a lesser value, unless either the last card - or the currently played card change those rules. When the active player can no longer play a card, their  opponent has won the game and has taken the seat of power away from their opponent.
EXPANSION AVAILABLE: Emissary (adds solo play). Add it during checkout for just $2 (normally $4).
$50,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Ragemore
Evil had beset the village, and we were  their last hope. We could not ignore our duty, so we set out on one last  quest. We fell one by one, until I was the last survivor. Holding  steadfast, I swung my axe one last time. As I crashed to the ground, I  knew I had found, at last, peace.
Ragemore is an 18 card solo game where you will complete quests, while managing  your hand and resources as you delve though the dark, fighting demons,  all in a span of 10-15 minutes.
Each card is two sided; a demon and a hero. In the beginning of the  game, the player will set up 2 piles of demon-sided quests and a party  of 3 hero-sided cards. Then an immediate threat is revealed from the draw deck as the current demon card that may or may not be dealt with.  If it is not killed, the demon card will go to one of the quests piles   and an event written on that card will take effect. If it is killed,  the  demon card is flipped to the hero side and becomes one of the  party. The player can also ignore the immediate demon threat and goes on  a quest to obtain the win condition, or parlay with some of the demons  to turn them into heroes but with the cost of the hero's morality: the  hero  is flipped to the demon side and joins the draw deck of demons.
$55,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Handsome
You are invited to an evening of wordplay.
In Handsome, you will create words using a common pool of letters and personal letter cards from your hand.
However, to score points, you're not only trying to create the longest word, you're trying to create words using the most cards of a single suit. With three suits available to score, every round you will see multiple opportunities for each player to score. The game ends when a player reaches 9 points.
EXPANSION AVAILABLE: The Brilliant Expansion (adds word types and a tiebreaker card). Add it during checkout for just $2 (normally $4).
$60,000 Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED! Anthelion: Conclave of Power
The sun is setting on one of the most devastating battles the Pocket Universe has ever seen. After years of fighting, it is becoming clear that this war will not be won on the strength of military victories alone. The leaders of the Dynasty and the Liberation turn their attention to some of the most influential figures in the galaxy to strengthen their  cause.
Who will be able to consolidate their power, gain new allies, and turn old foes to their side? Who can form a Conclave powerful enough to gain control of the Universe?
Anthelion: Conclave of Power is a game for 2  players who choose two unique special character abilities on their turn to manipulate the locations of the characters in play. Players seek to pull characters from all factions, good, evil and neutral to their side  of  the table (their Conclave), or push unwanted characters to their   opponent. The player that can amass ten  points of influence by  getting enough characters to cross all the way to their side of the table will be declared the winner.
Anthelion: Conclave of Power builds on the foundation of the two-player influence manipulation game Avignon: A Clash of Popes.
EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE: The Androids and The Folk (both add a new faction and planet). Add it during checkout for just $2 (normally $4).

Stretch Goals
We normally don't do stretch goals, but it's the entire point of this campaign! Each stretch goal will unlock a new game, which backers will vote for in the comments. When a new game is unlocked it becomes part of the pool of games you can choose from at the end of the campaign. Keep an eye on the updates to vote for your favorites! Here are some potential stretch goal games (and even more that aren't shown here).
We will pick about 3 at a time and ask you to vote for your favorite through the updates here. But feel free to start discussing your favorite games in the comments.
Here are some of the games we will be voting for. Look for the updates to vote.
Shipping Information
Shipping is automatically added in checkout. You can usually choose your reward level and see the shipping costs before fully checking out. 
US shipping costs: 
$4 for 1-3 games
 $5 for 4+ games
Canada shipping costs:
$10 for 1-3 games
$20 for 4+ games
Europe shipping costs (see VAT fees note below):
$12 for 1-3 games
$22 for 4+ games
Rest of the World shipping costs (see VAT fees note below):
$16 for 1-3 games
$26 for 4+ games
We will not be collecting VAT fees, so you may incur additional fees on delivery. Feel free to ask in the comments about others experiences, as we rarely hear of fees on the recipient end. But with the changes in the UK, it's hard to tell what to expect. 
Add-Ons
We usually offer a range of Add-Ons through our website, but these reprint campaigns can become very complex. Every single order is unique, and it makes fulfillment quite a beast. 
So in order to keep things simple, we are offering two featured add-ons, Sprawlopolis and Tussie Mussie. We will add them into the mix of games at the end of the campaign and you would just choose them in your survey. Since both of those games are in stock now, you may prefer to order them at our website and receive them sooner. To do so visit http://www.buttonshygames.com and use coupon code 0121backer to receive 15% off of your entire order wther you get those games or not. :)

Board Game of the Month Club
We have an awesome following of repeat customers. As a result, we've built the Board Game of the Month Club. 
It's a subscription service where you receive unreleased microgames,  promo cards, expansion content, and Kickstarter discounts ... every  month! Supporters also receive from $1 to $10 off EVERY WALLET GAME that we make. (Members back our Kickstarter projects at the $1 pledge level above and see the recent Patreon post for your specific discount.)
Our 2020 $5 packages include an episode of Personal Space, a solo game that has multiplayer interactions. It's part roll and write, part campaign, part digital, part real life, part fantasy. There are stickers and everyone receives some unique cards and unique combinations of cards. It's been live for a few months now, and it's our most  ambitious project yet and it will emerge until Feb 2021.
Then, we are starting up a new year long game in March. It's called The Final Lightyear.
In The Final Lightyear you'll play solo or cooperative with a friend, as the  captain of a so-called starship, in hopes of earning some rewards and a decent rep. Using tactical maneuvering and dice-based action selection, you'll work through the sector's small, medium and large enemies trying to gain rewards and ultimately live to see another day. Customizable episodes will challenge you with variable enemies and threats while  offering powerful new gear and talented crew to help you in your adventures.
Our $10 packages include all of the above and something extra. Generally it's a tiny game (up to 9 cards), or some expansion / promo cards for our existing games.
And our $20 package includes all of the above and a copy of the featured wallet game (or the wallet game of your choice). The featured wallet games may come with expansion material that is given away in the Kickstarter campaigns.
If that sounds cool to you, check out the Board Game of the Month Club on Patreon!
http://www.patreon.com/buttonshy
Thank you for checking out our 2021 Reprint Campaign!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With our method of publishing and using multiple manufacturers, there's always a chance that one part of the game could come in with an error, leading to delays. We've been able to minimize these errors in recent years, but they can happen from time to time. We've also upped our pre-press staff internally to make sure we can hit intended deadlines.

With COVID-19 some of our suppliers have been delayed, so we've been allowing additional time in our estimations and setting up backup suppliers as well. Our local staff is working while socially distancing, so we are allowing additional time for a smaller staff to assemble and ship games. 

Our two unfulfilled projects are moving along according to schedule. Our Agropolis Campaign is scheduled to be fulfilled in March and backers are up to date with the progress. Ugly Gryphon Inn is scheduled to be fulfilled after that and is moving very quickly and will be fulfilled early.

campaign.story:
Humanity is nearing its end.
The machines are on the verge of seizing control after making evil plans in the shadows over the years. Only GHOST, a special government unit, can oppose the machine revolution, but it seems the whole city is conspiring against them.
Become a part of GHOST and fight for the survival of your kind... no matter which one it may be!







PLAY







Always in the majority at the beginning of the game. They want to protect the network with blue firewall data chips and finish their mech "Apex". Sometimes they lose their advantage by other factions secretly recruiting humans.

Almost always present, just in small numbers. They want to contaminate the network with red virus data chips, as well as destroy all resources in the warehouse of the humans. At the same time, they want to build their secret weapon "Deus", which can carry the 'Human Punishment' virus directly into the network, if nobody should stop it. During the game, the Machines get information about who the Humans are and can even recruit 1 human if they are understaffed.

If the Legion is in the game, they start alone, but they have several ways to infect 1-2 players. Secretly, the Legion is working on lowering the city's security level as low as possible or raising the enemy threat level as high as possible. To accomplish this, they use their emerging followers called Crawlers, while also using some other sneaky tricks.


Sometimes 1 character is secretly Fallen. Through wrong tracing and misinformation, they try to send grey spam data chips to the junkyard or into the network. The Fallen character is always alone in his team, but their victory conditions overwrite those of all other factions and therefore make them unpredictable!


Outlaws suddenly appear out of all corners of the city. Coordinated attacks are very untypical for them. Due to their massive presence they significantly reduce the city's most important assets and increase the danger on the streets. Who controls them from the shadows?


Even though the government has always been breathing down our necks since GHOST SQUAD was founded, and would have loved to take the project to the moon, they are now very grateful that we exist. We worked hard to put together the perfect team, and it was anything but easy. Everyone on the team has exceptional talents, and they have mastered all the tasks we set them with bravura. Everything was demanded of them, both physically and mentally, so that they are ready for the worst-case scenario.



The Beginning is a complete and independent gaming experience. However, there is the option to combine it as a full-length campaign with Human Punishment - Social Deduction 2.0. The concept of combining two independent games from different genres is new. We call this a 'Connecting World System', or CWS for short. Through CWS, you will experience the beginning of the Human Punishment story with The Beginning. Throughout this journey, your decisions and actions will create specialized conditions and unlock unique outcomes, which then affect how the next game in the campaign is played: Human Punishment - Social Deduction 2.0. Here, you play the big final battle and write your own story, which thanks to all the variables, will be different every night!
Keep in mind that your loyalty is also maintained from Game 1 to Game 2, so between the games you will not be able to avoid trash talk. A unique evening awaits you!














We welcome verified retailers to carry Human Punishment - The Beginning.
For more info on bulk pricing and shipping discounts, please contact us at sales@godot-boardgames.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Product design
Aesthetics are important to us, but usability is paramount. Please consider everything represented in the campaign as works in progress and subject to minor changes (to meet usability, gameplay balance, engineering, and manufacturing requirements). The 3D renderings are conceptual pieces, and the final components might differ slightly in scale. Our goal is to make the game as beautiful and user friendly as possible, so we reserve the right to modify the product before delivery for these purposes.

Pledge manager
We will be using a pledge manager after the campaign. You will be able to fill in your information, select your language, add additional items, and pay for your shipping fees.

Currency conversion
USD price conversions were done based on the current market value at the time of this campaign. However, as they change daily, please look up the current exchange rate for the most accurate estimates. Remember, your pledge is in EUR, from which any necessary conversions will be made.

Exclusive content
All content that is marked "exclusive" will only be available for backers of Godot Games' Kickstarter campaigns, customers of Godot Games, convention visitors and some selected exclusive retailers.

Closing words
Godot Games has successfully funded 2 Kickstarter board game campaigns before and our team members have been involved in many other board game projects in the last few years. Oh, and we delivered our projects right on time - we definitely lived up to the gaming community's expectations. We know we have the right people on board to bring you an excellent game—and an exciting campaign to be a part of! The art and product specifications are nearly complete; barring any unforeseen events, we plan to finalize the files and begin the manufacturing process shortly after the campaign. But that said, due to the nature of producing a game with so many custom parts, there could be some unexpected delays. These might involve proofing, manufacturing, shipping, customs, COVID-19 uncertainties, and so on. To minimize a lot of these risks, we partnered with one of the industry's premier companies: Long Pack Manufacturing. Their reputation for high quality parts and service is something we can rely on. And no matter what, we promise you total transparency, with clear communication and updates every step of the way. We are grateful and honored to have your support. Thanks for your support! <3

Performance highlights
Tradition and technology meet in the stylish comfort of 100% Merino wool footwear.
This qualities combined make the Talent Jogger ideal for all styles and occasions.
Australian Merino wool is regarded as the finest and softest wool in the world.
The natural benefits unique to merino wool are not found in any other fiber - natural or artificial.
Merino wool has long been utilized in winter coats, fine scarves, and winter gloves. Now, we have applied this amazing natural, renewable material to footwear to create the most stylish and comfortable footwear experience with cutting-edge technologies.
With our meticulous selection process, the wool fiber sheared from one merino sheep only produces enough finished product for four pairs of Talent Joggers. We strike to put our best efforts toward sourcing the absolutely finest raw materials , combined with over-engineered components,  finding the perfect balance between style and utility, this is Talent Jogger.
Pure, supple Merino Wool covers every inch of your feet. For ultimate comfort the entire lining, including both sides of the vamp are covered with woven wool, surrounding your feet in unbelievable comfort. It’s like walking on a cloud.
Get every inch of your feet covered with Merino Wool
It's super cozy when wearing without socks
 🌟 'Feet-on' Review by Unbox Fantasy 


It feels terrible when your feet get wet on a rainy day. Forget your worries with TALENT JOGGER. They easily repel water splashes thanks to the  ”Teflon non-fluorinated stain and water-based stain repellent technology.” while still maintaining breathability. 
Besides, thanks to more than 100 curves on every inch of Merino wool, the wool upper effectively wraps your feet with premium wool sweater material during times of cold. Your feet stay dry and warm even without socks.
Say goodbye to heavy bulky boots. On top of keeping your feet and ankles warm, we are committed to developing a product that lets every user defy gravity, instilling TALENT JOGGER with a dozen high-tech components that provide comfy support without a heavy burden.  
Three major innovations make our shoes unbelievably lightweight-----only 8 ounces
1. Cooperating with Ortholite®, the world-renowned insole manufacturer, we designed a dual-layer insole - The top side that touches your feet is Merino wool and the bottom layer is full of air pockets that support your feet with a lightweight structure.
2. Talent Jogger uses ultra-lightweight, rubberized EVA for its outsole compound. 
A unibody construction such as this, provides both excellent abrasion performance and running-shoe elasticity.
3. Our original Hive-Impact™ outsole construction is the core innovation occupying the rear 2/3rds of the outsoles. 
With hexagon cavities, this design reduces even more weight from our insoles.
When combined, these innovations greatly reduce the weight of the overall shoe while still providing comfortable, all-day support. A pair of Talent Joggers is on average, 15% lighter than a typical pair of wool sneakers.
A pair of Talent Joggers is on average, 15% lighter than a typical pair of wool sneakers.
According to our ergonomics research, the proprietary Hive-Impact™ technology makes the rear 2/3rds of the outsole considerably more stable and structurally more rigid, while retaining the flexibility of the forefoot section.
The hexagon structure also supports your feet better than a traditional solid outsole when you walk, or even during jogging. 
In general, with our cutting-edge technologies, Talent Jogger can keep strong support for at least 18 months.
Merino wool is prized for footwear because it naturally wicks away moisture while remaining breathable. It continuously absorbs small amounts of liquid into its fibers, then wicking moisture away through small openings in the woven fabric.
 This results in a shoe that is never too hot, eliminating perspiration build up and leaving your feet dry and comfortable.

The unique open-cell structure of Ortholite® foam creates a moisture management system, helping to remove moisture and provide a cooler, drier, healthier environment. It also contains active anti-microbial agents to prevent fungi from growing inside your shoes.
Talent Jogger are the ultimate in comfort for bare feet.
Merino wool is easy to care for. Talent Joggers may be cleaned in your washing machine and air dried.  (Shoelaces and insoles are still recommended to wash by hand separately)
Sustainability is part of our mission.
1. Merino wool can be fully recycled and is often reused as material for carpets.
2. Ortholite® uses recycled rubber in every pair of insoles, and bio-oil from castor beans which reduces the need for petroleum-based ingredients in insoles.

campaign.story:
Welcome to the future of vision testing-- No appointments, no waiting rooms. The EyeQue VisionCheck 2 is the most convenient way to check your vision anytime, anywhere with real-time results. Use the personalized results to order new glasses online and track vision changes over time. This powerful smartphone attachment uses MIT-patented technology to measure your refractive error and provide EyeGlass Numbers - the lens power needed to correct nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism. The VisionCheck 2 comes with the PDCheck pupillary distance measurement tool so you can quickly and accurately capture your PD and order glasses with ease.
*NEW! Now the VisionCheck 2 can test for reading vision, commonly know as near-vision ADD (NV ADD). This ADD number can be used for reading glasses, bifocals, or progressive lenses.
VisionCheck 2 is the world’s only do-it-yourself smartphone-powered refractive error test. Some claim to have online or app-based refraction tests, but they are merely prescription verification services based on visual acuity estimates. EyeQue users are actually performing a self-refraction test while proprietary algorithms process, personalize, and store results. Leveraging the power and ubiquity of smartphones, the mobility of VisionCheck 2 brings accurate vision correction to billions of people, many of whom lack access to traditional vision care.
Sound too good to be true? Here's how to use it:
1. Download the iOS or Android app and sign up for an account.
2. Slip the VisionCheck 2 device onto your smartphone and follow simple on-screen instructions to start a test.
3. Look into the soft eyecup. Look for the red and green lines. Use the buttons on the device to move them and overlap into one solid yellow line. 
4. Once you are satisfied that the lines are fully overlapped, click on the "enter" button and gently rotate the thumb wheel to the next position. Overlap the lines again and repeat. The test consists of 8 measurements per eye.
5. See your results- EyeQue EyeGlass Numbers® (EGNs). 
Here's an example of what your EyeQue EyeGlass Numbers® (EGNs) will look like:
We are delighted to show you a proof of concept prototype video of the VisionCheck 2:
PLAY

Once you have your EyeGlass Numbers, the next step is to measure your pupillary distance using EyeQue’s PDCheck.
PDCheck
VisionCheck 2 includes another product called PDCheck. An accurate measurement of pupillary distance (PD) is necessary to order eyeglasses. If the measured PD is wrong, you will find the glasses uncomfortable and it will make you feel dizzy, it can sometimes even lead to headaches. Our patented PDCheck technology uses the smartphone camera to take a “selfie” and extracts the PD to an accuracy of +/- 1 mm.
How do you use PDCheck?
1. Download the iOS or Android app and sign up for an account then start a new test. Next, you should put on the PDCheck frames.
2. Center your face inside the oval and take a picture. 
3. Adjust the markers to the center of your pupils and T marks (if needed) to get the most accurate PD. Receive your pupillary distance measurement instantly! 
Once you have your EyeGlass Numbers and your pupillary distance, you can get Try-On Glasses or get new glasses online using your EGNs!

Our Try-On Glasses are custom made in California. 
At only $19 (shipping included), they are a low-cost, super-fast way to experience how well your EGNs and PD will work for you.
Subscription
EyeQue smartphone-vision tests require an annual membership subscription. Your active subscription provides unlimited vision testing, unlimited access to your vision data, and exclusive access to other EyeQue products and services. An All Access membership for our VisionCheck (1st generation) and Personal Vision Tracker devices is currently $4.99 per year. Service associated with the VisionCheck 2 will be $29 per year and will provide more personalized reports, enhanced customer support, and access to a host of new exclusive offers and discounts from EyeQue and EyeQue affiliates. To reduce uncertainty for you, we are including two full years of subscription service as part of your reward pledge. Contact us if you have any questions about our subscription service.
If you are already one of the 5,000+ backers who supported our Personal Vision Tracker campaign back in 2016, we are delighted to inform you that your membership remains free forever.  As promised, you are grandfathered into membership for life with your existing account.
For our many existing EyeQue customers, including those who have the VisionCheck (1st generation) with an active recurring All Access membership of $4.99 a year, we’ll have special options for you to extend your current membership rate for years to come. Stay tuned for more updates.
Yes, yes it does! Here's how the technology works, in a nutshell. 
The VisionCheck 2 is based on an MIT patented technology licensed exclusively to EyeQue. This technology has been extensively tested in previous generations of our products and uses a variant of the inverse Shack-Hartmann optical method.
The original Shack-Hartmann method is used in an optical device called "autorefractor" and trusted by eye doctors around the world. The autorefractor, short for "automated refractometer, is used to give a quick estimation of vision correction. You may recognize it by its iconic "hot air balloon" or "barn house" image. Many of the optical principles and components used in the autorefractor are also used in the creation of the VisionCheck 2.
The device projects two beams of light that comes from the smartphone display into your eyes and onto your retina. Using an interactive interface, the user overlaps the two lines to form what looks like one yellow line.
Based on the amount of pixel movement made to fully overlap the two lines into one yellow line, EyeQue calculates the user's refractive error. Proprietary algorithms then process results once a full test is completed. After three or more consistent tests are taken, EyeGlass Numbers® are calculated and presented in the same format as a traditional prescription with the spherical, cylindrical, and axis powers needed to correct nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism.
Users have performed approximately 150,000 tests using this proprietary technology. Hundreds of testimonials and thousands of surveys from VisionCheck customers helped inform product updates to VisionCheck 2. We set out to create a refraction device that's easier to use, with more accurate results, and better optics.
Based on the feedback of our members,  we came up with a brand new form factor, app design, and test screens – nearly every aspect of the user experience has been reimagined.
We're proud to announce that the VisionCheck 2 was named a CES® 2021 Innovation Awards Honoree in two categories– Health & Wellness, and Mobile Devices & Accessories

 A more interesting test taking experience with new backgrounds: A new background channel features a variety of customizable animated images that help you get more accurate results. 
 Larger, brighter, easier-to-see lines: A better optical system allows the display lines to appear larger and crisper than the lines in the previous device, making them easier to see, therefore improving test efficiency and accuracy. 
 Easier to attach clip system: A convenient clip that's compatible with most phone cases allows the VisionCheck 2 to easily attach to any phone without interfering with any buttons or Popsockets.
 Easy to rotate thumb wheel design: A new, purely mechanical, easy-to-rotate thumb wheel design allows you to proceed to the next test without having to take your eyes off the device, so you can maintain focus and complete the test faster. Plus, testing has been reduced from 9 meridians down to 8 meridians, making for a faster testing process.
 Upgraded eye cup design: A redesigned, ergonomic eye cup helps filter more light for an easier test taking experience. 
 Tactile buttons: Redesigned test buttons on the VisionCheck 2 improve the ergonomics of the test taking experience. The new buttons also eliminate the need to connect your device to your phone via Bluetooth - this also eliminates the need for batteries, so you don't need to charge the VisionCheck 2.
 Brand new app: A reimagined app design maximizes usability. The new app includes educational elements and makes it easier to reach support.
The MIT-patented technology powering the VisionCheck 2 has been extensively tested with over 150,000 tests over the past 3 years and has been optimized to give excellent refraction values for ordering eyeglasses.
Moreover, at-home vision test results can be more accurate than a single point-in-time refraction test. Since your vision fluctuates throughout the day, taking multiple tests at different times of the day gives a better average refraction than a one-time refraction test during an office visit. Especially if someone is having a bad day!
Real VisionCheck and Try-On Glasses users share their stories. 
Dan:
PLAY

Michael:
PLAY

EyeQue has a family of vision testing products that work together to equip you with everything you need to order eyeglasses.
We cannot explain the science without explaining the human eye first. Nearsightedness, farsightedness and astigmatism occur when the eye lens and eye distance are “out of sync". Normal distance vision is the result of the light entering the eye and focusing exactly on the retina, where the brain interprets sharp images. Common deviations from normal vision include nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism. Nearsightedness, or myopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light before your retina. Farsightedness, or hyperopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light past your retina, both causing the brain to interpret "blurry" images. Almost 50% of the human population has some degree of nearsightedness, farsightedness, or astigmatism. These conditions are also known as "refractive errors".
The EyeQue VisionCheck 2 is an optical device that achieves the effect of a variable corrective lens as it translates pixel spacing on the smartphone screen to corrective powers. To simulate the effect of converging or diverging rays into your eye that a correction lens would provide, you simply move the pixels on the screen closer or further, emulating the effect of a corrective lens. The goal is to overlap the red and green lines and create a single yellow line. Think of the VisionCheck 2 as a custom converter of pixel spacing to optical power. Using that conversion, VisionCheck can determine corrections from + 8 D to – 10 D.
VisionCheck 2 uses your smartphone's display to work. A pixel spacing on the order of .07 mm (70 microns) or better is needed – the diameter of a human hair. VisionCheck 2 works well for phones down to 326 Pixels Per Inch (PPI). Any PPI below 326 means that the resolution is too low for it to be optometrically accurate.
The iPhone 6S, for example, has an adjacent pixel spacing of 21 microns, and about 63 microns between same color pixels. With this small pixel spacing, VisionCheck 2 exceeds 0.25 Diopter resolution. As a reference, 0.25 Diopter accuracy is the level typically achieved by Optometrists.
While it is easy to understand how EyeQue can measure the overall optical power for nearsightedness and farsightedness, VisionCheck 2 also gets an accurate measurement of astigmatism by sampling over different angles. To measure astigmatism, a complete set of power measurements is comprised of 8 measurements for your right eye and 8 measurements for your left eye. Measurements are made at increments of 45 degrees and with these measurements, the astigmatism is computed.
Yes, that’s a lot of measurements, but the device is making measurements of tiny differences that reflect the shape of the eye lens and cornea. About 1 diopter of astigmatism, a typical value, implies that the non-spherical component of the eye is about 0.25 mm. 0.25mm is thinner than your average ball-point pen point.
All computations are carried out in the EyeQue cloud as it takes a substantial amount of computation that is dependent on many different parameters including the smartphone you are using. As you take more tests, the results are aggregated together through averaging and removing bad data points. Each test is scored based on the goodness of the computed fit to the measurements. An example of test results is shown below.
Along with your test results, we also provide you with a measure of the consistency. The plot on the right also shows how other users have performed as shown by the relative size of the blue dots; most but not all users fall into the "good" category. Our personalized vision report is a great way to stay in touch with your test results and vision changes.
Several EyeQue products, including the first-generation VisionCheck, have undergone clinical studies regarding their accuracy. We are in the process of publishing our findings (spoiler: they work extremely well) and will share them with our backers as soon as we can.
It all started with two friends who shared a vision.
Today, EyeQue has a team of dedicated scientists, engineers, marketers, designers, and support professionals helping advance vision care, one pair of eyes at a time. 
EyeQue’s Medical Advisory Board provides guidance on the Company’s services, products, and programs with a particular focus on identifying opportunities for EyeQue to serve and partner with the medical community.
The board provides insight into the current and evolving vision healthcare environment, helping EyeQue to pinpoint the specific needs of healthcare providers, serving patients from within and outside of the doctor’s office, where EyeQue technologies could be used to serve those needs in a meaningful way. The board is comprised of distinguished Ophthalmologists and will expand to include additional representatives as EyeQue’s business evolves.
A Mission to Bring Affordable Eye Care to Everyone
We’re putting accurate vision tests directly into the hands of people around the world. Our patented technology makes self-administered eye tests available to billions of people – many of whom may not have had the ability to test their eyes and correct their vision without access to low cost, convenient solutions.
A Global Need to Raise Our EyeQue
It is estimated that more than sixty percent of the world’s population are vision impaired. Hundreds of millions of people, adults and children, are challenged daily by the discomfort and struggle of normal tasks like reading, studying, working and caring for their family. In fact, the global economic cost of lost work productivity due to people with poor vision has been estimated at 700 billion dollars per year.
Refractive error, which eyeglasses correct, is the number one cause of vision impairment in the world. Yet for many families in many countries, access to an optometrist is limited or even non-existent, and the costs associated with obtaining corrective eyeglasses are not affordable. Sometimes corrective eyeglasses are not even available. Our goal is to enable anyone, anywhere in the world to self-administer an accurate refractive measurement test. With our advancements in technology, the mobility of the testing platform, and the commitment to affordable vision solutions, EyeQue will empower people all over the world to easily access and inexpensively correct their vision and improve their daily lives.
Myopia (or nearsightedness) is the most common cause of blurry distance vision. If uncorrected, myopia can increase the risk of developing more serious vision problems including cataracts, glaucoma, retinal detachment, and macular degeneration - all of which threaten sight. Yet this condition is easily corrected, and progression can be slowed with corrective glasses.
A closer look at this myopia epidemic:
Uncorrected refractive error has been steadily climbing and is now the second most common cause for blindness (~20%), with the first being cataracts (~35%).
We’re taking the growing myopia epidemic head-on by rapidly developing and distributing innovative at-home vision tests and devices.
Our Road is Long and Unpaved
We introduced the first at-home smartphone-powered refractometer in October 2016. With our continuous customer feedback in mind (primed by our Kickstarter backers!), we're on schedule to deliver our third generation refractometer in a few months.
EyeQue's Goals
Empowering people to test their vision as often as they like in the convenience of their home.
Arming the optometry, ophthalmology, and optician industries with technological advancements to improve patient care by enabling remote vision monitoring.
Bringing vision testing to areas of the world that lack standard eye care and allowing people to correct their vision with eyeglasses.
EyeQue is also actively seeking non-governmental organizations (NGOs) to use our technology to expand their reach and enhance their services, particularly in areas lacking eye care professionals.
 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

There is minimal risk to this project. EyeQue has successfully launched and delivered 5 crowdsourcing campaigns on multiple platforms and understands the manufacturing, app development, and logistic challenges.

We are confident that we will deliver the product on time.

The EyeQue VisionCheck 2 hardware is made to be shared. Multiple people in the same household can use the same unit of the VisionCheck 2 to maximize the usability. Our hardware device does not contain any batteries, so there are no environmental hazard if disposed. We choose all-paper packaging whenever possible to increase the recyclability of our product.

EyeQue is committed to sustainable practices and chooses carbon-neutral deliveries whenever possible.

campaign.story:
Kingdoms of the Deep is an area control and simultaneous action selection game for 1-6 players in 45-60 minutes where each player is vying for control of the Underwater Kingdoms.                       
SOLO MODE HAS BEEN ADDED!
In Kingdoms of the Deep you play as the leader of a faction of sea creatures, competing with your rivals for control of the undersea kingdom. Over the course of three ages, each composed of a variable number of rounds of play, you will choose one of six possible actions to take. 
 Simultaneous Action Selection: All players choose their action and reveal at the same time; if any player is the only one to choose a specific action, they get a bonus! See if you can anticipate what other players are doing so you can gain an advantage that will allow you to take over the Kingdoms! 
 Escalating Shark Attacks: All players can control the shark's actions so you want to make sure that the shark is close enough to take out your opponents but far enough away that your creatures are safe! As the game goes on, more sharks are added to the game and the waters become increasingly dangerous! 
 Variable Scoring Conditions: Each age, there's a different way to gain points and the goals change at three times in the game. There are goals that are based on being on the board in specific spatial patterns, for specific types of terrain, and for having specific actions of your species upgraded, among other things! There are three goals per game and every game is very different based on which goals come up. 
Can you outthink your opponents to seize the Kingdom?
 And Add-on your custom water Animeeples!
In English: 

In Spanish:
Kingdoms of the Deep Overview
Each player controls one of the undersea factions and starts with control of one type of terrain. 
Each turn, players simultaneously select from 6 possible actions to play. 
Players reveal their actions at the same time. Anyone who was the only player to choose that action will get a bonus, which depends on the specific action. 

Playable actions are:
Move:  Move any of your own creatures, your opponent's creatures, or even the shark! If you choose to move a creature into Atlantis, you get a bonus point.
Deploy:  Place a creature onto a tile that either has at least 1 of your creatures on them or is adjacent to a hex with your creatures on them. 
- Creatures are placed one at a time, so you can travel across the ocean kingdoms quickly with this action.

 Bolster: Place cubes onto tiles that are your terrain focus. This allows you to place a lot of creatures out quickly.
Upgrade: You may upgrade one action (move, bolster, deploy, etc) on your player board. This will allow you to do more the next time you select that action AND can grant you extra bonuses as well. 
Shark: Take control of the shark! Use shark actions to move the shark or have the shark eat up creatures! These can be  (yours or your opponent's)! 
Reset: Take all your played cards back into your hand! Previously played cards cannot be reused until you reset! 
- Depending on how the player has upgraded their Reset action, they might also get to do a variety of things when they reset.
Every turn a reset is played,  the Age marker is moved on the game board. Once the age marker is moved three times, the age ends! 
At the end of an age, players gain points if they control capital cities and from Goal cards. Goal cards can award points or actions, then the next age begins! 
After three ages, the game is over. 
Score the final round and reward bonus points to whoever has the most creatures in Atlantis.

The player with the most points is crowned Monarch of the Undersea Kingdoms!

 Lost Kingdoms: Pangea in Pieces 
200 million years ago, dinosaurs roamed the massive supercontinent of Pangea. But the Earth slowly began to break apart. As the lands shifted, these great beasts moved across the globe, seeking new homes to ensure the survival of their species.
Lost Kingdoms: Pangea in Pieces is a game of tile laying, tile shifting, and area control. Each player directs a different species of dinosaur, competing to have the most dinosaurs on each of the ever-changing landmasses.
Roar and Write! 
 It’s time for the Selection Committee of the Animal Kingdom to choose the new monarch to rule over all. Now it’s up to you to appease the five council members on the Selection Committee to win the Regency. The catch...each Committee member is appeased in a different way, so you must choose wisely as you can only appeal to one each Age.
Roar and Write is a competitive press-your-luck game about impressing different council members on the selection committee, garnering favor throughout the five kingdoms, and completing your own personal objectives to rise to the top of the selection committee's choices for the new ruler of the Animal Kingdoms.
People sometimes wonder why they should back a Kickstarter campaign instead of waiting to get the game later in retail. The most important reason not to wait with Kingdoms of the Deep is that even if Kingdoms of the Deep funds, we currently don't know if Kingdoms of the Deep will go into distribution. If you wait, you may end up missing out, as we won’t have many extra copies to sell and unless your local store backs the campaign, they won’t be carrying it either.
 Kickstarter Limited – Kingdoms of the Deep might be very hard to find after the campaign, outside of select conventions. 
 Help Us Improve Kingdoms of the Deep – We have a ton of stretch goals planned to help improve the game for everyone!
 Discounted – After the campaign, we will sell the extra copies at a higher cost.
Most importantly, without you, Kingdoms of the Deep would not get created.
Kingdoms of the Deep is a game we love and want to share with the world. We have been working on this game for several years to make it the best it can be. Kingdoms of the Deep brings together the things you loved from Animal Kingdoms and adds on a depth that we know you'll enjoy. We love playing and know you will, as well.
We really appreciate your support in making our dream a reality.
We would love to support game stores by offering the Kickstarter versions of Kingdoms of the Deep to retailers during the campaign. Back the project at the retailer level for $50, and we'll contact you closer to when we ship out rewards to get a count of games that you wish to get! An invoice will be sent to you before we ship your rewards.
We will be charging shipping after the campaign ends. This ensures you get charged the shipping you deserve. No more, no less.
By doing this, we are able to factor in your pledge tier, add-ons, and all fancy things that may occur during the campaign. However, we can offer estimated shipping costs. Below is estimated pricing for one copy of the game.
Please keep in mind these are estimates and there can be slight variations from country to country. Also, the more items you purchase, the more shipping will cost. If you have any questions, please email us at support@galacticraptorgames.com.
*We are currently not planning to ship to the following areas: Mexico, Brazil, and Russia.
To order a second copy of Kingdoms of the Deep, add an additional $39 to your pledge with no additional shipping cost.
We are happy to discuss group orders, but these need to be handled on a country-by-country basis. Please send us a direct message including country and number of copies to discuss.
What do you get when two board game publishers who love outer space and dinosaurs join forces? Galactic Raptor Games! That’s right, Carla Kopp of Weird Giraffe Games (Tumble Town, Fire in the Library, Stellar Leap, Dreams of Tomorrow) and Dan Letzring of Letiman Games (Adventure Tactics, Groves, Neverland Rescue, Dino Dude Ranch) have joined forces to publish under their joint venture Galactic Raptor Games.
On top of our already successfully fulfilled game, Animal Kingdoms, we have both been in the industry for years and have delivered a combined total of 18 Kickstarter campaigns between the two of us. Combining our strengths will lead to a bigger and better future for our companies and for more fun games getting to your tables!
We love getting to know our community better, so be sure to connect with us on social media and say hi!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
THINGS CAN CHANGE 
All images used in this Kickstarter are subject to change and may represent unfinished or non-final art or design. All card counts are subject to change. All card and component names are subject to change. All packaging is subject to change. Rules are subject to change. 

As the game has not been manufactured yet, all images and descriptions are what we are aiming to create. It is possible during the production process that some items might change in appearance, functionality, size, or quantity. We will attempt to keep such changes to a minimum. 

FULFILLMENT 
Bezier Games, Inc. has been publishing boardgames for more than 10 years. Several factors can cause delays that are beyond our control, including manufacturing issues and shipping delays. The COVID-19 pandemic could be a factor in possible delays; in all cases, we've tried to incorporate a reasonable level of padding into shipping estimates. 

The estimated fulfillment is December 2021, but keep in mind that this is just an estimate, this year more than ever before. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others. 

RESTRICTED DELIVERY 
Due to increased frequency in Kickstarters failing to deliver to certain locations, Bezier Games, Inc. has decreased the amount of locations Kickstarter rewards may ship to. This is because of several reasons - the majority being issues of reward packages getting lost, stolen, being unable to clear customs. In addition to this, some countries have been removed due to heavily increased accounts of piracy. 

Bezier Games, Inc. will only be shipping to the following locations: United States of America, Puerto Rico, Canada, United Kingdom, Europe (European Union, Albania, Andorra, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Georgia, Iceland, Kosovo, Liechtenstein, Macao, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Norway, San Marino, Serbia, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, Vatican City), Australia, New Zealand, China, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, South Korea, Taiwan, Philippines, and Military (APO)

SHIPPING
Shipping is charged after the KS campaign concludes, based on the actual costs Bezier Games incurs to ship from distribution centers to your delivery address. All shipping & handling costs will be paid by backers through our BackerKit Pledge Manager. Links to this pledge manager will be sent roughly two weeks after the campaign ends. The BackerKit pledge manager is a 3rd party used to finalize orders and shipping outside of Kickstarter, Kickstarter has no responsibility in this regard. Shipping costs vary based on where you will have your reward delivered; we always do our very best to ensure backers the best price possible. 

At the start of this campaign, we expect the box included with the Collector level and Royal level to be about 300 x 300 x 160mm (similar to the Suburbia Collector’s Edition “regular” box) and weigh about 11 pounds. The Colossal level includes the same box, PLUS an additional box which we expect to be about 300 x 300 x 148mm, shipped together in a single carton weighing about 26 pounds. The shipping estimates below reflect these calculations.
 
Regional applicable taxes will be calculated in the Pledge Manager as well. Our shipping is US, CA, EU, UK, AU friendly meaning rewards will ship from within these regions. Any VAT for EU and UK will be collected in the pledge manager.

REFUNDS 
Bezier Games, Inc. will do whatever they can to minimize the risks but, should a backer become uphappy, we are willing to refund pledges if issues should arise while the Pledge Manager is open. Refunds of 100% of collected funds are available within the first 14 days of a campaign's end. Past that, Kickstarter still needs to collect their portion of the pledge which we do not cover. This results in a 90% refund given if it is requested after the 14 day period. Once the Pledge Manager closes, refund requests will be reviewed on a case by case basis. 

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed. Bezier Games, Inc. is not responsible for changes in the rate of foreign exchange. 

TERMS AND CONDITIONS 
By pledging to this project, you agree to conduct all public interactions via Kickstarter's communications channels with this project and our team and other backers in a positive manner. Harassment, name-calling, or attempts to inject inappropriate content into the public communications channels will not be tolerated. Bezier Games, Inc. reserves the right to cancel any pledge. 

If we ship to the address that you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is returned to us as undeliverable you may be required to pay the full cost to ship your reward again to a revised address. 

If we ship your reward to the address you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package tracking status shows as delivered to that address, but you are unable to receive it, or you have moved and are no longer the occupant of that address and cannot otherwise retrieve the package, or if the package is lost or stolen after delivery, and you wish to have the order fulfilled again, you may be required to pay the full cost to ship the order to a revised address in addition to the amount of the original reward including any add-ons and other upgrades on your order. 

If we ship the reward to the address you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is held in customs or by any other government agency, our ability to help may be limited. You may be required to contact your customs agency or government and arrange for the package to be cleared and released at your expense. We are not responsible for any fees levied against your pledge by customs or any government agency. We are not responsible for any refunds or re-shipments for packages held by customs or a government agency. 

Other than as noted elsewhere in these terms & conditions, if any part of your order cannot be fulfilled for any reason Bezier Games, Inc. will provide you with a pro-rated refund for that portion of your order. 

If you do not log in to our Pledge Manager and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. Bezier Games, Inc. reserves the right to deny or fulfill orders beyond these 8 weeks under our discretion. If you confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our Pledge Manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. 

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the retail release. 

If you have questions or concerns about these terms & conditions please email orders@beziergames.com for further information. Thank you!

updates.update_userinfo: Box Design Inquiry - What are your thoughts?
updates.update_content:
We could use your input!
We are considering adding pull tabs to the box top to help when removing the lid; these half moon cutouts are typically on the box sides to the right and left of the cover.  We have heard some folks don't care for the way the tabs look aesthetically when the game is stored upright on its side when shelved.  Another option would be to put the tabs on the top side and the bottom side so they don't show when shelved, but you would have to turn the box to pull the lid off easily.

Here is a shot of one of the colossal beauties that came out of the last game we played.
