updates.update_content:
Greetings, Dear Tribe Members!
We hope you are all having a great summer! Please forgive us for the shortness of this update, but this is because we are still in the PPC process. Although it’s a demanding process and there is a lot of work involved, there isn’t much in the way of news to share with you as we continue to work hard!

Greetings, Dear Tribe Members!
The day has come, and we are excited to tell you that yesterday we shared all of the core files with our manufacturer (except from the solo rulebook). For this reason, this update will be brief since we spent most of our time finalizing and passing the assets of the game to our manufacturer. Over the next couple of days we will make sure that the files are approved. Additionally, during the following weeks we will work hard in order to finalize and deliver the rest of the assets (modules-expansions). Once we are done, a custom copy will be produced and sent to us for proofing. Having said that, we are happy to inform you that we are still on track for our initial plan of a December delivery.

Greetings, Tribe Members!
We are here, working non stop, every day, 24/7 ! :)

FINALIZING
We are currently facing the busiest and most demanding period of the project, working hard to finalize all of its assets.

campaign.story:
PLAY



PLAY





Hello everyone ... My name is Marsio Salcuni, and I am a lover of Music, Physics and Magnetism, and one day, I got the idea of combining these three things in my own way! ... And I must admit that it didn't go badly ... That idea gave me the opportunity to build my first X-PICK, and start having fun experimenting and playing ... As you can see from the videos, however, I started to understand that it was much more important than just having fun ... Starting to know how to use it, I discovered that it is a set of everything a guitarist or bassist should have always with him ... All enclosed in a little gem! ...
I apologize for the guitar or Bass performances, but in my defense, I delight more in singing, and this strengthens my desire to see my X-PICK in the hands of REAL GUITARISTS or BASS PLAYERS, to see the thousand other facets that they are able to discover (moreover because each of you has different instruments, amplifiers, settings, etc ... and being Magnetic Fields, they will always be different, with different results, different sounds etc ...)
Each of you will contribute to the growth of the X-Pick's capabilities, and yours! Because you will have 1000 more ways to MAKE MUSIC!


The X-PICK has a size of 24 mm x 25 mm.
It has a thickness of 4 mm and has a well-defined tip, but with a very wide angle, such as to facilitate simple picking or normal fast picking.
The DESIGN, combined with the type of MAGNETIZATION, never creates problems of too much attraction towards the strings ... The maximum magnetic degree, is poured only on the faces of the magnet as Physics teaches us, and strong enough, but calculated, on the back of the X-Pick to use magnetic field modulation techniques! ... It is obvious, for example, that the bass strings suffer more attraction, given their thickness, but this in no way prevents the fast and precise picking, as you have seen from the videos because you can take advantage also of a Magnetic Trick, to improve Normal Picking and Fast Picking:
Exactly at the tip, at the union between the North and South magnetic fields, there is no attraction with the iron strings, but an imperceptible, but decisive repulsive force is felt, which facilitates the Picking, as if the string were thrown.
The reason is that the iron atoms of the string, being close to both polarities almost simultaneously (i.e. picking) do not have time to reorient themselves for the attraction, and combined with the fact that the power of magnetism always focuses on the faces of a magnet, I opted for axial magnetization that collides the opposite magnetic fields, right in the tip, and I created this kind of magnetism game to facilitate and speed up the movement of the pick ...
The rear corners are cut in order to facilitate the use of some particular techniques, and ensure the right degree of magnetism in the interaction between magnetic fields with the Pickups.
It has very smooth lateral surfaces to slide on the strings like a slide would and the back is the one that has the most magnetic degree, because it is the widest, suitable for all the innovative techniques that require magnetic field modulations of the pick-ups of the instruments
The direction of magnetization of the pick is AXIAL, in such a way as to adapt to any type of polarity of the pick ups on the market:

POLARITY (with a compass):
PLAY

MAGNETIC FIELDS (with iron powder):
PLAY

So, when you hold the X-Pick in your hand, it will be a normal pick size for you, while the PickUps of the instrument, thanks to the high degree of magnetism N52 of the Neodymium, they will see the equivalent of a magnetic soccer ball moving over them.
And this will give you a lot of leeway in the distance with which to interact on the pick ups, adjust the Gain, the Tones and the Volume of the amplifier, to have a personalized sound so in detail, that you will be truly amazed! ...



ROUND PLASTIC CASE, TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND ALWAYS CARRY IT WITH YOU !!
CASE TO SHOW IT IN ALL ITS SPLENDOR AT YOUR HOME, 
WHERE YOU PLAY WITH YOUR BAND, 
OR IN THE SHOWCASE OF YOUR SHOP, 
OR FOR A PHANTASMAGORIC GIFT TO GIVE TO A MUSICIAN !!
 IT IS COMPOSED BY: 
- A WOODEN BOX,
- VELVET BEARING E
- NON-SLIP MAGNET,
WHICH ALLOWS THE X-PICK TO REMAIN ERECTED FOR EXPOSURE, IN FRONT OF THE LOGO THAT IS ALSO PRESENT INSIDE ...
- AND IN ADDITION WITH THE CHOICE "EXPO" YOU WILL ALSO HAVE THE "TACTICAL" CASE TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND TAKE IT WITH YOU ...
Ps. The X-Pick packages may vary a little, but only BETTER than those shown! Because if I find them more beautiful and in recyclable material, if I can have the logo engraved on the box directly, at a decent cost, I want my customers and my planet to be happier and happier!


And therefore, describing what happens, when I bring the X-Pick closer and away from the pick up of the instrument, there is a field modulation of the electromagnetic coils, with consequent change of shape, direction and intensity of the magnetic field between the X-Pick and the pick ups, to produce a different sound than usual ...
Using the X-Pick, you can change - IN REAL TIME - THE POSITION, THE SHAPE, THE POWER, THE INTENSITY, etc ... of the PICK UP, which will have their fixed magnetic field, modulated by a magnetic brother who moves on them!
AS IF YOU CREATED A DIFFERENT PICK UP FOR EVERY PICK POSITION, ADAPTABLE TO EVERY KIND OF NEED ...



PLECTRUM:
New approach in the use of the Pick, with the use of the Magnetic Trick explained above, to improve control and speed up the Pick;


BODY & CRISTALLINITY OF SOUND:
Crystallinity and Body of Sound thanks to this innovative material, the Neodymium, which makes it seem to ALWAYS PLAY WITH NEW STRINGS!


SLIDE:
A Wonderfull Slide, again thanks to Neodymium, which guarantees a Great Sustain! ... but also under another aspect: Finally you will use the Slide with the right hand in an agile way, leaving the left free to put chords, managing to act even only on the single note !! ...


PICK – TAPPING or "TAPPICK":
The Pick that will allow you to give a brilliant and perfect note just to contact, without having to press the string on the fret like a Viking, like with normal picks! In fact, it makes the notes shine even where there is no guitar fretboard, so much that you will use it for magnificent and wild tapping, where no one has gone before!


BRUSHES EFFECT:
Sound produced only by the magnetic fields, bringing the pick closer to the Pick Up, and making them pass the strings, one by one or all together to create the rolls;


MAGNETIC FIELDS DELAY:
Delay of any kind of sound you want; Just one touch on the note or chords, like the classic pedalboards, and then you have Total Control over the Delay ... You'll be able to slow down or speed up the delay, accentuate it, change the sound in real time ... A simple delay pedal, to do this, IT SHOULD READ IN YOUR MIND!


POWER & ETERNAL SUSTAIN or ELECTRIC VIOLIN:
Only sliding on the string gently, with the back or side of the X-Pick; HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU HOPED THAT YOUR BENDING WILL LAST IN ETERNAL GARY MOORE STYLE ???? ... NOW YOU CAN DO IT TOO !!! ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR LESS EXPENSIVE AND PERFORMING GUITARS !!
OCTAVER:
Just slipping on the string with the back of the pick, adds more than an octave to the traditional guitar fretboard with a bright and powerful sound!


HYPER PICKING:
THE TECHNIQUE BORN WITH THE X-PICK, that will allow you to play without touching the strings, and to interact only through magnetic fields! In this case the change in polarity of the magnetic field acts (Attraction/Repulsion), because the movement of the pick is right - left with respect to the string ...


MAGNETIC FIELDS TREMOLO:
OTHER X-PICK TECHNIQUE, which differs from Hyper Picking, because the movement of the Pick with respect to the strings is up and down, that is, close to and away from the string quickly ... In this case there is Compression of Magnetic Fields (Only Repulsion) ... TECHNIQUE THAT FINALLY WILL MAKES TREMOLO POSSIBLE EVEN ON LEVER-LESS GUITARS!


REVERSE / ROTARY:
Technique that thanks to the magnetic fields, will gives us the possibility of having these effects even without a pedal board ... And then ... How many times have you brought the effects pedals to an evening of the band, to use them in a single song?


 EPIC ATTACK: "THE GOD OF ROCK" 
Versatile and Innovative Pick Attack thanks to Neodymium, and speaking personally, it is one of the most exciting things this little treasure will makes with your support!


ULTRA MAGNETIC CONVENIENCE:
You will be able to magnetically attach your X-Pick wherever you want thanks to the high magnetic degree: to an iron necklace, a bracelet, a belt, a ring, near any small iron part or small part of the same guitar as I did in the video , and speed up your changes from accompaniment to solo! ...


MANY EFFECTS TO BE DISCOVERED:
In addition to the one shown above, and that you could see from the videos, you must keep in mind that the combinations of use of the X-Pick are infinite ... I am talking about the all different instruments we have, and therefore with different magnetic fields, completely new results , or used together with different pedals, amplifiers of various brands and powers, and I could go on forever as you well know… SO IT'S A NEW WORLD TO BE COMPLETELY DISCOVERED BY EACH OF YOU !!!


ATTACH OBJECTS WHERE YOU WANT:
Hang a sheet on the refrigerator, Hang a screwdriver or hammer, Hang up the cell phone, ...


LEARN SCIENCE OF MAGNETISM:
With a Magnet so strong, it will be easier to learn the rules of magnetism at school, at home, anywhere ...


MAGNETIZE OBJECTS:
Such as Screwdrivers, screws, Knives, paper clips, etc .






Now, let's get to the description of the object; this magnetic pick is made with material named Neodymium, from the category of rare earth permanent magnets, is chemically composed with NdFeB (Neodymium-Iron-Boron) and will have a coating that can be of different types ...
Let's do some clarity ... Why are neodymium magnets so strong?
Neodymium magnets are often referred to as super magnets. They are, compared to ferrite, much more attractive. Some of them are six hundred times their weight. Energy density is expressed in kilo joules per cubic meter (kJ / m3). To illustrate the difference between ferrite and neodymium magnets, there is a numerical example: ferrite magnets usually have an energy density of around 30 kJ / m3. Neodymium magnets, on the other hand, have a maximum energy density almost 20 times higher, i.e. around 500 kJ / m3. Most of these are not used in the private sector, but are preferred in industry or similar work areas. The reason for their enormous adhesive power is in the chemical compound and crystal structure. This has great anisotropy and extremely high coercive field strengths. This summary table is only demonstrative, but it is very close to the actual one of our Magnetic Pick:
COATING OF THE MAGNETS IN GENERAL AND THE ONE CHOSEN FOR THE X-PICK
The surfaces must be sealed with a protective layer. For this step, the material must be thoroughly clean and dry. There are many different magnetic coatings for the production of neodymium magnets. The most commonly used coating is a Ni-Cu-Ni coating, that is, a nickel-copper-nickel composition. Other possible coatings are:
Gold plating (Ni-Cu-Ni-Au) Chromium (Ni-Cu-Ni-Cr) Copper (Ni-Cu)Zinc (Zn)
Epoxy resin (Ni-Cu-Ni- Epoxy)
... and I chose Epoxy Resin so as to give more grip in contact with the fingers ...
… as well as for protection from wear …


I tried to make the X-Pick by myself, like the ones you see in the videos… I made them all by hand with the cutter; but there is a problem ... If magnets reach a critical heat point, they lose a lot of their magnetism, and with the cutter or any other tool, that point is far surpassed! ... And it is for this reason that I am collaborating with a magnet manufacturers, to have my custom patent (pending) made ... It is the only way for the moment, at least until I can afford to open a business independently ...
Unfortunately, this company need a substantial amount of X-PICK to give me an advantageous quote, for various reasons:
The first is the cost of the material, the more it is, the less they pay for it too;
The Second is for all instruments and processes for magnetization to grade N52;
The third and most expensive is the mold created specifically for this patent (pending); of which they asked me to contribute with the cost of the realization, because the company cannot use it for any other purpose ... 
In fact, the products that I will ship, will be produced with:
MAGNETIC CERTIFICATION,
ALL THE SAME AND PERFECT, THANKS TO THE MOLD OF MY PATENT (Pending),
WITH A COATING AGAINST WEAR, AND TO IMPROVE THE GRIP BETWEEN THE FINGERS,
WITHOUT THE MINIMAL DEFECT OR IMPERFECTION!
But all this has a cost, namely the amount of the loan, structured to fall within the minimum order possible to make this company accept to make the aforementioned mold for my X-PICK.
I am doing my best to make my little dream come true but I would need some of your help ... 
And to thank you, I show you the birth of the X-Pick!
PLAY



On a technical level:
When you'll playing with the X-Pick, you will not hear those annoying hums due to too high gain or too open tones or exaggerated volumes ... This happens because the X-Pick, being made of ferrous material and magnetic, in contact with the strings, IMPROVE THE GROUNDING SYSTEM OF THE INSTRUMENT, closing better the mass that makes the usual turn in your body only from the left hand; a round of Grounding that is usually stopped by the normal picks of non-conducting material ...
Demostration:
PLAY

Also, again in relation to grounding, IT HELPS TO CONTROL AND DISSIPATE THE EDGE CURRENTS that accumulate from time to time on strings, making you even get shocked! And I bet you all know what I'm talking about! ...

And then on a philosophical level:
And for this I have to go a little personal ... Well, I'm one of those who sweated with work and the few savings his GIBSON LES PAUL STUDIO, and this desire to have it, created a bond ... let's say I'm one of those who believe that every instrument has a SOUL, a CONSCIENCE, and an OPINION to express… And when I play, I speak to her! SHE TALK TO ME! ...
So why not give maximum voice to this essence? ...
LET YOUR GUITAR OR BASS EXPRESS, IN NEW WAYS, WITH SOUNDS THAT HAVE NEVER HEARD OR PRODUCED, WITH NEW TECHNIQUES ... NEW VIBRATIONS !! ...
MY GUITAR WILL ALWAYS BE GRATEFUL FOR THE X-PICK ... IT FEELS ...

Ah, I just wanted to show you who I am ... 
Pleased to meet you ...
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As I said before, I managed to create my first X-Pick by myself, but with consequent loss of magnetism ... In fact, to work the so-called permanent rare earth magnets with high magnetic potential, you need a lot of machinery, expensive machinery, that only a company already started and that does only this can have.

I do not have the presumption of wanting to open a magnet company immediately, but simply to collaborate with one of these companies, so that they develop a special mold of my patent and provide to magnetization and coating. By proceeding in this way, I will be able to start creating a way forward, because Rome wasn't built in a day! And I tell you as an Italian! That's it! … 

Things start small, and if you've read this far, I'm sure you'll help me take a small step !! I'll thank you forever!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Well, the design of this object, in terms of shape, is structured not only for functionality, but also to be looked at, so even if you don't use it as a pick, it's a gem that makes its effect on display, to last in eternal ...
Reusability and recyclability
Speaking at the material level, it is made of neodymium, a powerful magnet, which can be exploited for a thousand other uses even if it breaks and which maintains its magnetic charge for hundreds of years ... You could pass it on, from father to son for at least 5 generations !! ... An X-PICK IS FOREVER !!!
Sustainable materials
If I have a wider choice of X-Pick packaging, I would like to opt for recycled plastic, always with the round shape of the tactical packaging, and highly sustainable wood, always maintaining this great style of shape ... 

'Cause guys, the Planet really needs it, and if I can do something for mother earth in a small way, I do it more than willingly !!

Hello to all dear Musicians,
the company we collaborate with to create the X-Pick Patent, has taken another little time for the processing of the picks, because as we said the shape is difficult to achieve; in fact, they told us that the only thing that is slowing them down is the realization of the Magnet Tip, because there is no such thing, and therefore they too are inventing a method to make it as sharp, but resistant as possible. updates.update_userinfo: WITH 4 X-PICKS, THE NEW "ALL BLACK" VERSION IS FREE!
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone ... We are releasing this update following some requests from many kind backers here on KickStarter and Indiegogo, who have placed multiple orders ...
In practice on Indiegogo, there is no possibility to buy more than one at a time, and every time apply the shipping costs! ... And this actually doesn't seem correct to us ... So, considering that we can't split the price, we want to make sense of that extra money by doing an exclusive promotion:

Hello everyone, the company that is taking care of the production contacts us often, and assures us that within one month, we will be able to send you everything! ...

campaign.story:
Raid is a card game where you build longboats with Viking warrior cards, attack and destroy enemy longboats and deal Raid damage to their village. The game is quick to learn and each round takes about 20 minutes to play for 2—4 players, ages 14 and up.
The team behind Raid also publishes another Kickstarter darling—Beasts of Balance.
In Raid, you take control of a Norse God and draft/draw warriors to your clan. The goal is to build longboats from your warriors, destroy the other player's longboats, and finally raid the other player by sending your warriors to their village. The player with the least amount of Raid damage at the end of the game wins. To further help you defeat your enemies, you can use the God and Rune powers available to you. Go forth and conquer Midgard!
PLAY




This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing

Our team has designed, manufactured and shipped complex products including connected devices and we are the publisher behind the award winning game—Beasts of Balance (currently available around the world and rated 4+ stars everywhere).

There are always inherent risks when manufacturing a new game and recent world events (e.g. a global pandemic) have added new challenges to most manufacturing supply chains and processes, but we are adept at dealing with issues that are common in manufacturing products at scale and the logistics required to deliver them around the world.

Our manufacturing partner makes many of the most popular games on the planet and is also well equipped to deliver Raid to our backers—on time and on budget.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!
We know you are as excited as we are for you to start playing Raid and we've been working hard behind the scenes to make that happen.
As you may recall, in our last update we were working on finalizing production art and what we thought was a final rules review.

updates.update_userinfo: Production Updates & BackerKit Surveys Closing in Three Weeks
updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!
Production
We just wanted to let everyone know the factory is back up and running following Chinese New Year and we are continuing to work with them to finalize production art/etc.
As part of our pre-production process, we are conducting our final rules review to get some fresh eyes on those documents. This will help ensure everything is easy to understand and get setup and playing when you receive your copy of Raid! This is the final detail for us before we go to production.

updates.update_userinfo: Launching next week... Beasts of Balance: Rebirth
updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!
While we're all waiting for the delivery of Raid this summer, we have some exciting news to share about another one of our games.
As some of you may know (and others may not), the Modern Games team acquired the hit game Beasts of Balance last April. We have been huge fans of BoB since the early days and are excited to carry this brilliant game forward into the future.

updates.update_userinfo: The Gods in all their Glory!
updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!!
We've been hard at work with the factory to ensure Raid is the very best it can be when it arrives on your doorstep this summer (currently targeting May/June for deliveries). In fact, since the campaign ended, we decided to upgrade all of the cards from 300gsm Bluecore to 310gsm Ivorycore. This upgrade will apply to all backers, across all versions!
We have also finalized illustrations for all of the God cards which was an unlocked stretch goal during the campaign. Like the rest of the Raid art, they are beautiful.

Hey Viking Warriors!
It's been a minute since our last update, but we've been hard at work prepping and testing the Raid BackerKit survey and illustrating the God cards (Stretch Goal) + prepping all the art for delivery to the factory. More on the latter soon!
In the next day or so, you’ll receive an email from us with a special link to your BackerKit survey. It’s important to respond to your survey as quickly as you can since we need this information to fulfill your rewards.

updates.update_userinfo: We did it, you did it!
updates.update_content:
To the nearly 2500 of you who backed Raid, shared it with friends and family and chatted with us over the past few weeks, thank you, thank you, thank you! We are deeply humbled by your support and kind words.
Now the real work begins as we shift fully into production and fulfillment mode. The good news, we've done this before. This isn't our first rodeo as we've designed and shipped products worldwide. We are currently shipping our other game, Beasts of Balance and its myriad of expansions, across North America and the EU on a daily basis and we will lean into our manufacturing and logistics processes to ensure Raid delivery runs smoothly as well.

updates.update_userinfo: Raid is a game that was designed to travel, while traveling the world
updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!
To say the Modern Games team loves traveling would be an understatement.
Founders, Justin & Amanda, took their then 2 years old daughter, Zoe, on a multi-country, six week trip through Europe as Justin embarked on the 1500-mile Virgin Strive Challenge in 2016.

Hello! My name is Brennen Peters, the lead game designer on Raid for Modern Games. I wanted to use the Dev Diary as a place to share interesting points about the decisions we made during the creation of the game and also interesting tidbits about how to play well against your enemies!
When to raid, when not to raid
In this first chapter I wanted to talk about the main mechanic that makes Raid special: The trade off mechanic between when to keep a warrior on your longboats and when to send them as raid damage.

updates.update_userinfo: First unlocked Stretch Goal (God Illustrations) & other updates
updates.update_content:
Hello Viking Warriors!
We had intended to send out a couple updates prior to today, but the past week or so has been crazy to say the least.
Justin & Amanda (two founders of Modern Games) and their daughters + pups had to evacuate their home due to a wildfire in Southern California last Monday. It was dicey for a while and there were hotspots just feet from their home, but the firefighters did a great job and managed to save all the homes and buildings in the area.
